6. $(x+4)(3y-6x+9)=0\Leftrightarrow\left[\begin{array}{c}x+4=0,\\ 3y-6x+9=0.\end{array}\right.\Leftrightarrow\left[\begin{array}{c}x=-4,\\ y=2x-3.\end{array}\right.$
$$$$% TIKZ_ID{task006-solution-fig1}
